questions: Can you provide examples of projects where you have utilized your skills in AWS, Java, and Kubernetes?

How do you approach troubleshooting and debugging issues in Information Technology, specifically in relation to AWS, Java, and Kubernetes?

How do you ensure the security and efficiency of systems when working with AWS, Java, and Kubernetes? Have you implemented any best practices in this regard?
